name: Skeletus
description:
Defend your castle at all costs!

No instructions needed! Follow us on Twitter for more information on the game's development.

This game was made over the course of 20 hours for the 2016 Austin VR Game Jam.

Requires a SteamVR compatible headset + controllers.

Created by

  • Devin Weidinger
  • John Romanowski
  • Mike Leach -- mleachgames
